EmailTemplate.subject: Invitation: Get ready for the biggest changes in QuickBooks AU history!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Intuit
View on web
We're almost full at our next extra special VIP event!
Get ready for the biggest changes in QuickBooks historyâ€¦ 8 BIG developments over 8 weeks and it all starts at our Melbourne & Sydney VIP events!
Be the first to hear about a range of new product releases and enhancements. Get a glimpse into the future including some BIG announcements around new features and app/add on partners. You will have an opportunity to test drive some of our newest features and partner add on's.
You will also have a chance to meet a VIP from the Intuit family, Terry Hicks - Head Honcho for QuickBooks Product Strategy & Management!
BIG changes are coming! Don't miss out on this opportunity.
Level 13, Citigroup Centre, 2 Park Street, Sydney NSW 2000
You are receiving this email as you have logged your details and made contact with Intuit before.
